title: Accounts in "From" menu
content: I want to sort my email accounts (alphabetically) in the "From" drop-down menu for a new message. I can edit a hidden file if needed. Thanks David
creator: claradalloway

title: I can't drag emails to folders on my new laptop
content: I've been able to drag emails from my old laptop to subfolders using IMAP. The folders are on the server and with my old laptop, I could drag emails from any account to any folder, regardless of which account it was created under. I started trying to do that with a new laptop and it won't let me drag the email. I have to go through the move > search for folder > select folder process. It's a pain in the butt, especially if I have a lot of emails I want to move. Since I could do it on my old laptop, I'm thinking it's some kind of setting that I have on one that I don't have on the other. I just can't figure out what I did differently on the new laptop that it won't let me drag and drop the emails where I want them.
creator: navoff

title: All emails disappeared!
content:
It started with duplicate Archive and Drafts folders...so I checked TB help, and it gave me several suggestions, including going to my Profile folder and deleting duplicate folders from there. Everything seemed fine...until I realized that suddenly TB has NO emails later than 2022! I went in to Gmail to see if I could recover them...but they're all missing there as well. In my business account--also through Gmail, but managed through my domain name--not just my Inbox, but EVERYTHING is gone. It's as if I never existed.

This is extremely upsetting: I teach and have my own business, and losing all my emails is catastrophic.

Can someone please help?
creator: joanm48

title: I am not receiving new e-mails
content: I am expecting an important e-mail and none have come through for 2 days. Can someone please fix what ever the issue is so I can receive my e-mails. My e-mail address is: [edited from public forum] @southslope.net

title: Unable to open some, but not all, emails.
content: I have Mozilla Thunderbird email application with Windows 11. Recently I have problems opening some email texts, but not all. I do receive the mails and heading, but the contents are not displayed. This goes for some mails, and I do not see any connection as to which ones open and which ones don't. I would appreciate your advise. Bo Dahlberg
creator: dahlberg.bo

title: Opstellen mail vanuit Excel werkt niet meer sinds update 146.0
content:
Wij stellen veel standaard mails op in Excel en deze worden dan verzonden met Thunderbird. Dat gaat met dit stukje VBA-code: strTh = Zoekpad_Mail & "\Mozilla Thunderbird\Thunderbird.exe " 

   strCommand = strCommand & " -compose " & "to=" & Chr(34) & Aan & Chr(34)    strCommand = strCommand & " ,preselectid=" & Chr(34) & Mail_ID & Chr(34)    strCommand = strCommand & ",subject=" & Chr(34) & Betreft & Chr(34)    strCommand = strCommand & ",body=" & Chr(34) & Inhoud & Chr(34)    strCommand = strCommand & ",attachment='" & Bijlage_Zoekpad & "'"        Shell strTh & strCommand, vbNormalFocus

Daarbij zijn een aantal waardes in Excel bepaald (Zoekpad_Mail, Aan, Mail_ID, Betreft, Inhoud en Bijlage_Zoekpad). Nu wordt de mail nog wel opgesteld, en het e-mailadres (Aan) wordt ook gevuld, maar de rest allemaal niet. Weet iemand hoe dit op te lossen?

Alvast dank!
creator: rob280

title: Calendario Thunderbird non fa comparire avviso eventi rimandato
content: Buongiorno, da un po' di tempo ho un problema piuttosto importante: se oggi mi compare un avviso di un evento che mi ricorda una scadenza, ma ho necessità di posticiparlo per X motivi, non me lo posticipa. La scadenza dell'evento non viene più proposta, come succedeva invece in passato. Grazie per supporto

creator: augusti.andrea

title: Certifikát S/MIME - ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER
content:
Nahraju platný p12 certifikát s SHA-256, který v MS cert store funguje a má platnou celou cestu přes 2 autority -> root a sub, a jde s ním podepisovat. Nahraju mu zde i ty 2 CA. A při odeslání mailu s podepsáním hodí ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER. To samé vyhodí při tlačítku "test" u výběru certifikátu v nastavení.

Zkoušel jsem p12 vygenerovat znovu, různou kombinaci nahraných CA (jsou platné - přímo od vydavatele), vymazat key store a cert store databáze Thunderbirdu a nechat je znovu vygenerovat, přeinstalovat Thunderbird... v správě certifikátů má celá cesta všechna práva (SSL, Emaily). Je přihlášený účet s správným mailem.

Na jiném PC s stejnou verzí Thunderbirdu, antiviru a Certifikátu - funguje na první pokus.

Win11 s aktuální verzí TB 146. Neběží zde žádný neobvyklý SW.

Co víc lze udělat kromě reinstalace OS?
creator: petr.mencl1

title: Hacer que Thunderbird sea el gestor de correo predeterminado en Windows 11
content: He instalado Thunderbird en Windows11, pero no puedo hacer que sea el gestor de correo predeterminado, siempre que intento mandar un email desde una aplicacion me abre outlook. Como puedo hacer que Thunderbird sea el predeteminado?
